panel.title: Current Estimated Total Size of SmartStore Cache in S3

search.query: | stats sum("cm:bucket.estimated_size") as size | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 2) | rename size as "Size in GB"

panel.title: Current Estimated SmartStore Size by Index (GB)

search.query: | stats sum("cm:bucket.estimated_size") as size by index | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 3) | rename size as "Size in GB"
| search cm:bucket.status=local | stats sum("cm:bucket.estimated_size") as size by splunk_server | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 2) | rename size as "Size in GB"

panel.title: Size of All Local Cache and Indexed Data by Indexer (GB)

search.query: | dbinspect index=* cached=f | search state!=hot | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) as CacheGB by splunk_server, index | eval CacheGB=CacheGB/1024 | xyseries splunk_server, index, CacheGB | rename VALUE_* as *

panel.title: Size of SmartStore Index Data vs. Local Index Data by Indexer (MB)

search.query: | dbinspect index=* cached=f | join type=outer bucketId splunk_server [| rest /services/admin/cacheman | rex field=title "(?<bucketType>[^\|]+)\|(?<bucketId>[^\|]+)" | search cm:bucket.status=local] | fillnull value="Not in cache" cm:bucket.status | stats sum(eval(if('cm:bucket.status'="local", sizeOnDiskMB, NULL()))) as Cache, sum(eval(if('cm:bucket.status'="Not in cache", sizeOnDiskMB, NULL()))) as "Non-Cache" by splunk_server

panel.title: Estimated Total Size of SmartStore Cache in S3 by Index (bytes)

search.query: index=summary search_name="SmartStore Cache Size" | timechart span=15m sum(cm:bucket.estimated_size) by orig_index | rename VALUE_* as *
